channel.title: CVE Feed for Microsoft -- Microsoft Exchange Server
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Microsoft -- Microsoft Exchange Server

item.title: CVE-2018-8154|2024-08-05T06:46:13.709Z -- microsoft -- microsoft%20exchange%20server
item.description: A remote code execution vulnerability exists in Microsoft Exchange software when the software fails to properly handle objects in memory, aka "Microsoft Exchange Memory Corruption Vulnerability." This affects Microsoft Exchange Server. This CVE ID is unique from CVE-2018-8151.

item.title: CVE-2018-8581|2024-08-05T07:02:25.866Z -- microsoft -- microsoft%20exchange%20server
item.description: An elevation of privilege vulnerability exists in Microsoft Exchange Server, aka "Microsoft Exchange Server Elevation of Privilege Vulnerability." This affects Microsoft Exchange Server.

item.title: CVE-2018-8152|2024-08-05T06:46:13.718Z -- microsoft -- microsoft%20exchange%20server
item.description: An elevation of privilege vulnerability exists when Microsoft Exchange Outlook Web Access (OWA) fails to properly handle web requests, aka "Microsoft Exchange Server Elevation of Privilege Vulnerability." This affects Microsoft Exchange Server.

item.title: CVE-2018-8604|2024-08-05T07:02:25.858Z -- microsoft -- microsoft%20exchange%20server
item.description: A tampering vulnerability exists when Microsoft Exchange Server fails to properly handle profile data, aka "Microsoft Exchange Server Tampering Vulnerability." This affects Microsoft Exchange Server.

item.title: CVE-2018-8448|2024-08-05T06:54:36.554Z -- microsoft -- microsoft%20exchange%20server
item.description: An elevation of privilege vulnerability exists when Microsoft Exchange Outlook Web Access (OWA) fails to properly handle web requests, aka "Microsoft Exchange Server Elevation of Privilege Vulnerability." This affects Microsoft Exchange Server.

item.title: CVE-2018-8374|2024-08-05T06:54:35.818Z -- microsoft -- microsoft%20exchange%20server
item.description: A tampering vulnerability exists when Microsoft Exchange Server fails to properly handle profile data, aka "Microsoft Exchange Server Tampering Vulnerability." This affects Microsoft Exchange Server.

item.title: CVE-2018-8151|2024-08-05T06:46:13.516Z -- microsoft -- microsoft%20exchange%20server
item.description: An information disclosure vulnerability exists when Microsoft Exchange improperly handles objects in memory, aka "Microsoft Exchange Memory Corruption Vulnerability." This affects Microsoft Exchange Server. This CVE ID is unique from CVE-2018-8154.

item.title: CVE-2018-8302|2024-08-05T06:54:34.931Z -- microsoft -- microsoft%20exchange%20server
item.description: A remote code execution vulnerability exists in Microsoft Exchange software when the software fails to properly handle objects in memory, aka "Microsoft Exchange Memory Corruption Vulnerability." This affects Microsoft Exchange Server.

item.title: CVE-2018-8159|2024-08-05T06:46:13.371Z -- microsoft -- microsoft%20exchange%20server
item.description: An elevation of privilege vulnerability exists when Microsoft Exchange Outlook Web Access (OWA) fails to properly handle web requests, aka "Microsoft Exchange Elevation of Privilege Vulnerability." This affects Microsoft Exchange Server.

item.title: CVE-2018-8265|2024-08-05T06:46:13.851Z -- microsoft -- microsoft%20exchange%20server
item.description: A remote code execution vulnerability exists in the way Microsoft Exchange software parses specially crafted email messages, aka "Microsoft Exchange Remote Code Execution Vulnerability." This affects Microsoft Exchange Server.

item.title: CVE-2018-8153|2024-08-05T06:46:13.471Z -- microsoft -- microsoft%20exchange%20server
item.description: A spoofing vulnerability exists in Microsoft Exchange Server when Outlook Web Access (OWA) fails to properly handle web requests, aka "Microsoft Exchange Spoofing Vulnerability." This affects Microsoft Exchange Server.
